pullRequest.body:
previously the `ext` tactic would fail for these classes. now it won't.

---

these lemmas are basically copied over from their non-extended equivalents.

Looks good! I've left a few minor suggestions, otherwise looks fine to me.

slight golf:
```suggestion
  cases' m with ed _ _ _ _ hU
  cases' m' with ed' _ _ _ _ hU'
  congr 1
  exact UniformSpace.ext (((show ed = ed' from h) â–¸ hU).trans hU'.symm)
```
maybe this should be `protected theorem` (to avoid confusion with other lemmas called `ext`)
